pageContent: Purpose: The aim of this study was to evaluate the impact of penile rehabilitation in restoring erectile function in patients submitted to anterior resection of the rectum (ARR) or radical prostatectomy (RP), comparing the results between these two groups.

metaData.source:
Age difference between patient and partner is a predictive factor of potency rate following radical prostatectomy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/17085166/
